name: Simple Wii Series Vol. 3: Asonde Oboeru: The Party Casino
overview: Simple Wii Series Vol. 3: Ason de Wakaru - The Party Casino (SIMPLE Wiiシリーズ Vol.3 遊んで覚える THE パーティー・カジノ) is the third work of "Simple Wii Series", a casino game with five popular games, such as: "21" and "Poker". The biggest feature of this game is the use of NDS and Wii communication functions. In the game, you can use NDS to play poker games, so that your cards are not bound to be seen by opponents! The game also provides global battle through Nintendo's Wi-Fi Connection.
